meanings.sent1: The school's annual picnic is always a fun event for students and teachers.
meanings.sent2: My family takes an annual vacation to the beach every summer.
meanings.sent3: The annual family reunion is like a yearly tradition that everyone looks forward to.
meanings.sent4: The annual migration of birds is a breathtaking sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The annual fireworks display lights up the night sky with bursts of color.

meanings.definition: A plant that completes its life cycle in one year.
meanings.sent1: The farmer planted annuals in the garden that bloom beautifully each year.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy gardening and always include some annuals in my flower beds.
meanings.sent3: The annuals in the garden seem to have a race to see who can grow the tallest.
meanings.sent4: The field of annuals swayed gently in the breeze, creating a sea of colors.
meanings.sent5: The bright petals of the annuals brought life and vibrancy to the garden.
